items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely High Quality, 100 % Luxe Cashmere- Green Sourced!
items.body: Impressive to the point that I will never shop anywhere else for genuine 100 percent Cashmere! This is a high end cashmere brand and sweater that will be difficult for anyone else to meet their standards of excellence. I now happily have several of KVSS cashmere HIGH quality women sweaters and am thoroughly IMPRESSED. Every single sweater is beyond my expectations. Their level of professionalism and the pride KVSS takes in their craftsmanship is noted and immaculate. This GORGEOUS, velvety soft black V Neck womenâ€™s cashmere sweater is tightly and consistently woven. I checked by holding it up to my brightest light. Thick as a 2-ply quality cashmere should be and does not feel chemically treatedâ€”astoundingly comfortable! I Neat stitching throughout, with the dye colors being rich, on trend, yet classic. A sewn in label confirms it is indeed 100 percent cashmere. The luxurious sweaterâ€™s KVSS tags are sophisticated and retail ready. The tags include an envelope with a spare cashmere thread, which I thoroughly appreciate. One of the KVSS tags inform me that it is â€œMade in Greenâ€, is â€œResponsibly Producedâ€ and â€œ Safety Tested.â€ The OEKO TEX logo is also included. Uniquely, there seems to be a â€œHornâ€ button at the bottom right hand side. It is perhaps coated or polished to a â€œpearlescentâ€ finish, bearing the company name â€œKVSSâ€. This is something I do not usually see in other brands of cashmere clothing. The Horn button pairs well with cashmere and adds a look of refinement and elegance. This is an immaculate sweater! Remarkable packaging! A beautiful, simple elegant cream and olive green colored box with a narrow olive green genuine leather bow for gifting purposes. I performed a gentle â€œbounce back stretch test â€œ and my sweater quickly returned to its original shape. This is an indication of high quality, as it did not sag. I do own a few cashmere sweater combs, Amazon sells them. I use them now and then, but have not yet had a need to use them on my KVSS brand new sweater. I have always bought my cashmeres (pants, coats, dresses, scarfs, sweaters) at a very high end luxury dept store that is as of recent, selling on Amazon. I am pleased that KVSS offers me yet another exceptional option for Cashmere clothing purchases. KVSS is new to Amazon. I know what to look for in cashmere and am willing to pay the price for quality. I can be quite the nitpicker like Goldilocks, and am pleased to report that I am highly satisfied with my lovely cashmere KVSS sweater! Thank you KVSS and VINEâ¤ï¸ . HIGHLY RECOMMEND! You will NOT be disappointed. Happy early holiday shopping. PS Photos coming shortly upon posting of review. Read more
items.author: Shoppher on the Fly!

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!
items.body: This sweater is so comfortable and nice to wear. It's easy to match and create stylish outfits and for being a 100% cashmere sweater, is pretty affordable! It's easy to care for and the sizing is accurate. If you expect to layer it and you're in between sizes, I would size up. The sweater a little bit of stretch to it too. Cashmere lasts and maintains its shape without pilling over time - only time will tell with this sweater but it looks and feels great! I love the v-neck and the fact that I can layer it easily without sacrificing comfort. This sweater is a great buy and would make a great gift! Read more
items.author: Katia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ðŸ‘ . I want to live in this sweater everyday ! Luxurious
items.body: I am absolutely obsessed with my new 100% cashmere wool sweater! The quality and workmanship are top-notch, and the feel is irresistibly soft and cozy. It's like being wrapped in a cloud - the texture is so smooth to the touch, and it's incredibly warm But without feeling heavy. I love that it's a mid-weight sweater, but it feels light and effortless when I'm wearing it. The knit is truly luxurious, in every sense of the word, it offers an elevated but classic v neck style It has a relaxed fit which I prefer especially during the colder months - it's not too tight, not too loose, just effortlessly PERFECT! I've been wearing it nonstop since I got it, and I can honestly say it's my new favorite piece in my wardrobe. The V-neck, cuffs and hem have a slight thin ribbed pattern. For my height the sweater hits at my hips But it ca be folded inward as well. For Reference : I am 36C ** 5â€™4â€ ** 168 lbs ** Size Large I am immensely grateful to have received this garment and in the color black which is so iconic, rich & vibrant And and it pairs well with just about everything. It can easily be dressed up with heels and dress slacks Or dressed down with jeans , suede boots and a suede bag. I've been wearing it with jeans, leggings, and Even with a skirt. it always looks great. Needless to say, I'm OBSESSED I need more of these sweaters in my life - itâ€™s the perfect combination of style, comfort, and quality while feeling cozy and warm. Measurements Taken -25.5â€ in length from shoulder to hem -21â€ Width from armpit to armpit -24.5â€ Sleeve from shoulder to cuff Read more
items.author: ðŸ‘  FashionLover

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft material, loose fit though
items.body: I like how soft this sweater feels against the skin, and thatâ€™s easily its best quality. The cashmere material feels smooth, warm, and gentle, which makes it really comfortable to wear throughout the day. However, Iâ€™m not a fan of the loose fit. I wish it had a more flattering, slim silhouette that shaped the body better instead of hanging loosely. Itâ€™s perfect for lounging or layering, but if you prefer something more form-fitting and structured, this might not be the ideal choice. The softness definitely stands out though, and it gives a touch of luxury to an otherwise simple style. Read more
items.author: MB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars KVSS V Neck Mongolian Cashmere Pullover, Black in M
items.body: I really like this sweater. It is lightweight but still very warm, which I appreciate, so I donâ€™t have to layer if I donâ€™t want to. The medium fits perfectly. For fit reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™3, 139 lbs, last body measurement: 35-31-45in. Modest hourglass. True to size. Very happy with the order! Update: when washing, be sure to follow the instructions! My mom washed and dried my laundry while I was in the hospital and there is a now a square shape in the back like a tag, but itâ€™s not. The thread is more see-through in that section Read more
items.author: Amazon Username

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Otter, Vermillion, Drizzle, Black, Latte, Slate, Blue Rinse. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
